title: 4356 N Drummond Pl - Unit 2
posting_body: Make your new home in the quiet and comfortable Hermosa neighborhood opposite popular Kelvyn Park with eight acres of green space, sports fields, and fitness facilities.

This vintage brick walk-up building offers newly renovated studio, one, and two-bedroom apartments with hardwood floors, new kitchens and baths with high end appliances, big bedrooms and closets, central heat, in-unit laundry great natural light and a new back porch.
Small Dogs and cats are welcome!
Walk to shops and services located along Diversey and Fullerton Avenues, or drive a short distance west to big box stores and supermarkets.
Diversey and Fullerton buses provide convenient connections into trendy Logan Square and to CTA Blue Line trains.
